validate_doc_update: function(newDoc, oldDoc, userCtx) { if(newDoc.type != 'block' && newDoc.type != 'trans') { /* throw({forbidden : 'type not allowed'});*/ log(userCtx);}}

shows.xml: function(doc, req){if (doc != null) return{ headers : {'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'}, body: doc._id}}
shows.html:
function(doc, req){ if (doc != null) return{ body : '
' + doc._id + '

' + doc.height + '

' + JSON.stringify(doc) + ''} }
